summary_short: Rodion Raskolnikov is the most connected figure (6 ties). Key relationship types: romantic interest.
highlights: Most central: Rodion Raskolnikov (6), Dmitri Prokofich Razumihin (3), Alyona Ivanovna (3), Porfiry Petrovich (2)
story_summary: Raskolnikov, feeling overwhelmed, struggles with his emotions as he interacts with his mother, Pulcheria, and sister, Dounia. He insists that Dounia should refuse her engagement to Luzhin, expressing his disdain for the marriage. Razumihin, determined to support Raskolnikov, offers to stay with him, while Pulcheria and Dounia are torn between their concern for Raskolnikov and their desire to help him.
